messages.content: Don't make assumptions about what values to plug into functions. Ask for clarification if a user request is ambiguous.
I don't have access to your location data. If you share your current latitude and longitude, I can help identify your city. Could you provide your coordinates?

No problem at all! If you are able to share any landmarks, nearby places, major streets, or other clues about your surroundings, I can try to help you figure out where you might be. Just let me know what details you have!
I don't have any details on that either.

That’s perfectly okay! Without location details or context, I can’t determine your city. If you ever get more information—like coordinates, landmarks, or something nearby—feel free to share, and I’ll do my best to help you identify your location. If you have any other questions or need help with something else, just let me know!
